title: Ashley Benson's chocolate brown bob is perfect for autumn
text:
From Harper's BAZAAR

Ashley Benson is known for having the ultimate Californian blonde; her sun-kissed tousled hair has been her signature, until now.

The actress's transatlantic colourist, Brittany King, and London's most in-demand hairstylist Larry King have just taken Benson brunette, with a choppy collarbone-grazing bob.

It looks stunning.

At Larry King's namesake salon in South Kensington, Brittany tells us, "Ash is always saying, 'what are we doing next with my colour'. So with prep for a upcoming role this fall we traded her usual blonde for a rich darker brunette which was inspired by Barbara Palvin’s colour on a recent red carpet."

Photo credit: NurPhoto - Getty Images More

"I wanted it to be a multidimensional brunette and a colour that best suited with her skin tone," Brittany explains of the transformation. "I used some of her existing blonde as her 'highlighted pieces', as well as adding low lights with EQ Shades by Redken, and finished off with a shiny gloss."

When it came to the cut, Larry King styled it with separation and texture at the ends - all without using a styling tool.

He explains, "I added my Volumizing Hair Mist to the crown for sexy volume and rough dried it using the Dyson Supersonic hairdryer until it was nearly dry. I then added a mixture of my Social Life for Your Hair and Redken's All Soft to add hold to the ends, then used the new Dyson Supersonic Gentle Air attachment to add a lived-in 'cool girl' edge to the crown. Once that was all done I pinned the centre parting behind the ears with grips to hold it in place."
